entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
